full_text:
Form No.54
Order of Acquittal of accused on compounding offences out of court under
Sec.320(8)Cr.P.C.
Proceedings of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram.
Present: Elsa Catherine George
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate.
Thursday the 27" day of February 2025
CC: 1978/2016
Complainant: State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Medical College Police Station in Crime No.
106/2016
(By A.PP. )
Accused: Jayachandran, 49 years, S/o Vasudevan, Kaattil
Veedu, T.C 1/421, Kumarapuram, Medical
College Ward, Cheruvakkal Village.
(By Adv. Smt. Asha K.1)
Offence: Punishable u/s 447 and 427 of IPC
ORDER
The offence having been compounded out of court/with the permission of
court accused is acquitted U/s.320(8) Cr.P.C.
Properties produced as T 70/2016, granite piece and brick piece, being
valueless, shall be destroyed.
Â¢
Kean : \
Sp.
Don SAS
: CSS WY.
a Elsa Catherine George,
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram.
Date of Offence : 03/01/2016
Date of Complaint : 19/10/2016
Date of Order : 27/02/2025
